original_text: God raised up the Lord Jesus, to become alive again after his death. Because we belong to Jesus, we know that God will also raise us up after we die. Together with you, God will take us to be where he is.
korean_text: 주 예수를 다시 살리신 이가 예수와 함께 우리도 다시 살리사 너희와 함께 그 앞에 서게 하실 줄을 아노라

sentences.original_text: God raised up the Lord Jesus
to become alive again after his death
we know that God will also raise us up
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께서도 우리를 다시 살리실 것을 압니다

sentences.original_text: God will take us to be where he is
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 우리를 그분이 계신 곳으로 데려가실 것입니다
